text: Please make it possible in the Apache JMeter UI - User Parameters page - to move the User variables up and down in the list, so that it's easier to group them logically.
creator: cristina.irina.kiss@gmail.com
p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
What element are you refering to ?
Can you make a screenshot ?
Thanks

Hello,

We need some controls to move the parameters up & down (meaning: above and below one-another).
Please see attached image.

Thank you!
creator: cristina.irina.kiss@gmail.com

Thank you for your help!
